The winning episodes were "<a href="/wiki/The_Empty_Child" title="The Empty Child">The Empty Child</a>"/"<a href="/wiki/The_Doctor_Dances" title="The Doctor Dances">The Doctor Dances</a>" (2006), "<a href="/w/index.php?title=The_Girl_in_the_Fireplace&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="The Girl in the Fireplace (page does not exist)">The Girl in the Fireplace</a>" (2007), "<a href="/w/index.php?title=Blink_(Doctor_Who)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Blink (Doctor Who) (page does not exist)">Blink</a>" (2008), "<a href="/w/index.php?title=The_Waters_of_Mars&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="The Waters of Mars (page does not exist)">The Waters of Mars</a>" (2010), "<a href="/w/index.php?title=The_Pandorica_Opens&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="The Pandorica Opens (page does not exist)">The Pandorica Opens</a>"/"<a href="/w/index.php?title=The_Big_Bang_(Doctor_Who)&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="The Big Bang (Doctor Who) (page does not exist)">The Big Bang</a>" (2011), and "<a href="/w/index.php?title=The_Doctor%27s_Wife&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="The Doctor's Wife (page does not exist)">The Doctor's Wife</a>".<sup id="cite_ref-176" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-176">[170]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-177" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-177">[171]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-178" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-178">[172]</a></sup><sup id="cite_ref-179" class="reference"><a href="#cite_note-179">[173]</a></sup> Doctor Who star Matt Smith won Best Actor in the <a href="/w/index.php?title=17th_National_Television_Awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="17th National Television Awards (page does not exist)">2012 National Television awards</a> alongside Karen Gillan who won Best Actress. <i>Doctor Who</i> has been nominated for over 200 awards and has won over a hundred of them.
</p><p>As a British series, the majority of its nominations and awards have been for national competitions such as the BAFTAs, but it has occasionally received nominations in mainstream American awards, most notably a nomination for "Favorite Sci-Fi Show" in the 2008 <a href="/wiki/People%27s_Choice_Awards" title="People's Choice Awards">People's Choice Awards</a> and the series has been nominated multiple times in the Spike <a href="/w/index.php?title=Scream_Awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Scream Awards (page does not exist)">Scream Awards</a>, with Smith winning Best Science Fiction Actor in 2011. The Canadian <a href="/w/index.php?title=Constellation_Awards&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Constellation Awards (page does not exist)">Constellation Awards</a> have also recognised the series.
</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="See_also">See also</span></h2>

</p>
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Further_reading">Further reading</span></h2>
<ul>
<li> Matt Hills. <i>Triumph of a Time Lord: Regenerating "Doctor Who" in the Twenty-First Century</i> (I.B. Tauris, 2010) 261 pages. Discusses the revival of the BBC's Doctor Who in 2005 after it had been off the air as a regular series for more than 15 years; topics include the role of "fandom" in the sci-fi programme's return, and notions of "cult" and "mainstream" in television.
</li>
<li> Tabloid Bintang Indonesia, <i>Doctor Who Pengganti Chalkzone</i>
</li>
<li> Majalah GADIS, <i>Kenalan Bareng Doctor Who</i>, <i>Ketemu Bareng 1st–11th Doctor</i>
</li>
</ul>

<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Official_websites">Official websites</span></h3>
<p><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Rellink&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Rellink (page does not exist)">Template:Rellink</a>
</p>
<ul>
<li> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:BBC_programme&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:BBC programme (page does not exist)">Template:BBC programme</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.doctorwho.tv/">Doctor Who 50th Anniversary: Official BBC Worldwide Site – Doctor Who </a><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:!&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:! (page does not exist)">Template:!</a><a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.doctorwho.tv/"> Doctor Who</a>
</li>
<li> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Bbc.co.uk&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Bbc.co.uk (page does not exist)">Template:Bbc.co.uk</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/archive/changingwho/">BBC: The Changing Face of Doctor Who</a>&#160;– many press cuttings and articles from 1963 onwards
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://doctorwho.bbcamerica.com/">BBC America <i>Doctor Who</i> website</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://web.archive.org/web/20090525094905/http://www.spacecast.com/shows/doctorwho.aspx?">SPACE Channel <i>Doctor Who</i> website</a>
</li>
</ul>

</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/doctorwho/archive.shtml">Doctor Who Series 1, 2 &amp; 3</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.bbc.co.uk/doctorwho/classic/">Doctor Who Classic Season 1&#160;– 1996 Movie</a>
</li>
</ul>
<h3><span class="mw-headline" id="Reference_websites">Reference websites</span></h3>
<p><a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:TardisIndexFile&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:TardisIndexFile (page does not exist)">Template:TardisIndexFile</a>
</p>
<ul>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.shannonsullivan.com/drwho/"><i>Doctor Who</i>: A Brief History Of Time (Travel)</a>&#160;– a production history of <i>Doctor Who</i>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.drwhoguide.com/">The <i>Doctor Who</i> Reference Guide</a>&#160;– synopses of every television episode, novel, audio drama, comic strip and spin-off video based on the series
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.drwho-online.co.uk/"><i>Doctor Who</i> Online</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.gallifreybase.com/">Gallifrey Base</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://gallifreybase.com/w/index.php/Main_Page">BroaDWcast&#160;– Doctor Who transmissions around the World</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://doctorwhotv.co.uk/">Doctor Who TV</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0056751/combined"><i>Doctor Who</i> (1963) at</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Internet_Movie_Database&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Internet Movie Database (page does not exist)">Internet Movie Database</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0116118/combined"><i>Doctor Who</i> (1996) at</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Internet_Movie_Database&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Internet Movie Database (page does not exist)">Internet Movie Database</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0436992/combined"><i>Doctor Who</i> (2005) at</a> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Internet_Movie_Database&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Internet Movie Database (page does not exist)">Internet Movie Database</a>
</li>
<li> <a href="/w/index.php?title=Template:Amg_movie&amp;action=edit&amp;redlink=1" class="new" title="Template:Amg movie (page does not exist)">Template:Amg movie</a>
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.tv.com/shows/doctor-who/"><i>Doctor Who (1963)</i></a> at <a href="/wiki/TV.com" title="TV.com">TV.com</a>  
</li>
<li> <a rel="nofollow" class="external text" href="http://www.tv.com/shows/doctor-who-2005/"><i>Doctor Who (2005)</i></a> at <a href="/wiki/TV.com" title="TV.com">TV.com</a>  
</li>
</ul>

		</ul>
	</div>
</div>
